name: Aegiscript
tagline: A geoinformatics script language written in C#
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here using GitHub Flavored Markdown, select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Description
Developed as part of my bachelor's thesis, AEGIScript is a simple interpreted scripting language created using the ANTLR C# target. It comes with a minimalistic IDE that features syntax highlighting and static code completion with hints.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
